title: AFKERS HAVE TOO MUCH POWER
body: Serously, this game has done little to nothing to adress the issue of afking having too much power to infulence the outcome of games partically rank ganes where one after can waste hours of your time trying to get to promos.

replies.body: Well, on the contrary, I've been reading a lot of complaints from players who have been AFK in their past games about the new Leaver Busters punishment system. e.g. 20 minute queue bans on the next five lower priority matches. So I say Riot has been doing a decent job of increasing the punishment levels of players that AFK.
Riot should make a game that have at least one AFK'er in it a Loss prevention... or it wouldnt actually be fair
That idea isn't possible I'm afraid. People would just abuse the loss prevention by going AFK is defeat is inevitable.
mahahahasahs not improssible counter stike has dealt with the problem with afkers prefectly with just a relacement and kick voting

It would be impossible to script that, every game no matter what runs on a script, to script a thing like the less LP for afkers or whatever it is would be impossible or take years to get it right, to be honest I would much rather see tribunal back, that way summoners can put their input into who gets banned.
Maybe a system that isn't exactly loss prevented but gives some leniency to the rest of the team (And if someone is to do it in ranked they can lose more LP for it.
